location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a copy of a communication received from Sir Gore Ouseley (not present) and a copy of William Bruce's instructions to C Cookney, Commander of the Barbara Pattamai(see f. 35v). It further notes that the situation in the Gulf has meant that the Barbara Pattamaihas not been able to leave port without an escort.
